title: So rank is bull 2020( moderators do see messages but end up deleting)
body:
As my previous message stated earlier as it was rudely deleted by these moderators who seem to read our messages but dont do shit about it.....

I play rank to improve get better but it sucks having people afk, dc or feed especially in bloody RANK even normal is better to play. After losing 6 rank games in a row now cause of this i dont know what to do anymore especially with the season just starting and im afraid it may continue. Playing since season 3 i have seen the game over the years get worse and the feed back i do consistently not being heard by these so called riot people. Investing 1000's of hours on this game over the years and my long term goal trying to reach diamond its hard to reach with being put with budget people who dont help nor communicate with muting does not do anything aswell.

Any professionals out there want to give me a hand as i am consistently trying but my team aint trying aswell

Kind regards 
Norbit1234

You not seen that ive been gold for 3 of those years ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ dumb ass and i have seen you just joined so dont talk to me scrub i need people who are in diamond and above need assistance on improving not your negative feedback
